name: Finger Drum HERO
description:
Practice your finger drumming skills with this little rhythm game!

Get views and thumbs up to promote your awesome rap and drum  abilities, and try to reach TRUE INTERNET  F A M E

If you have a MIDI drum pad, you can use it to play, and configure your own controls.(If the configuration doesn't work, just restart the game. Your mapping will still be recorded)

Have fun!

Made with love and laughter for the Music Game Jam 2017 by:

Flore "Salty Penguin Programmer" Duno (@flore_duno)

Miss "UI IS MY KRYPTONITE FFS" Myu (@MissMyu_)

Seb "I am so not a rapper pls stop" DaRoux (@SebDaRoux)
